channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- HarmonyOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- HarmonyOS

item.title: CVE-2023-41299|2024-08-02T18:54:05.074Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: DoS vulnerability in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-1692|2024-08-02T05:57:25.092Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The window management module lacks permission verification.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39407|2024-08-02T18:10:20.327Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The Watchkit has a risk of unauthorized file access.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality and integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-39394|2024-08-02T18:10:20.290Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of API privilege escalation in the wifienhance module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the arp list to be modified.

item.title: CVE-2023-39400|2024-08-02T18:10:20.303Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the installd module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause sandbox files to be read and written without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-41305|2024-08-02T18:54:05.092Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of 5G messages being sent without being encrypted in a VPN environment in the SMS message module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-41310|2024-08-02T18:54:04.997Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Keep-alive vulnerability in the sticky broadcast mechanism. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause malicious apps to run continuously in the background.

item.title: CVE-2023-34154|2024-08-02T16:01:54.173Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of undefined permissions in HUAWEI VR screen projection.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will cause third-party apps to create windows in an arbitrary way, consuming system resources.

item.title: CVE-2023-34165|2024-08-02T16:01:54.253Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Unauthorized access vulnerability in the Save for later feature provided by AI Touch.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause third-party apps to forge a URI for unauthorized access with zero permissions.

item.title: CVE-2023-37240|2024-08-02T17:09:34.173Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of missing input length verification in the distributed file system. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause out-of-bounds read.

item.title: CVE-2023-0117|2024-08-02T05:02:43.787Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The online authentication provided by the hwKitAssistant lacks strict identity verification of applications. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability of features,such as MeeTime.

item.title: CVE-2023-3455|2024-08-02T06:55:03.306Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Key management vulnerability on system. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service availability and integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-39384|2024-08-02T18:10:20.421Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of incomplete permission verification in the input method module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39383|2024-08-02T18:10:20.322Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the AMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may compromise apps' data security.

item.title: CVE-2023-41304|2024-08-02T18:54:04.969Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the window module.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the size of an app window to be adjusted to that of a floating window.

item.title: CVE-2023-37241|2024-08-02T17:09:34.175Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Input verification vulnerability in the WMS API. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39403|2024-08-02T18:10:20.339Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the installd module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause sandbox files to be read and written without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-6273|2024-08-02T08:28:20.355Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission management vulnerability in the module for disabling Sound Booster. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39396|2024-08-02T18:10:20.338Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Deserialization vulnerability in the input module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39390|2024-08-02T18:10:20.462Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameter verification in certain APIs in the window management module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-41296|2024-08-02T18:54:04.956Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of missing authorization in the kernel module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect integrity and confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39389|2024-08-02T18:10:20.308Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause home screen unavailability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34166|2024-08-02T16:01:54.177Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of system restart triggered by abnormal callbacks passed to APIs.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-34162|2024-08-02T16:01:54.175Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Version update determination vulnerability in the user profile module.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause repeated HMS Core updates and cause services to fail.

item.title: CVE-2023-39380|2024-08-02T18:10:20.384Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the audio module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause audio devices to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-34155|2024-08-02T16:01:54.066Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of unauthorized calling on HUAWEI phones and tablets.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-3456|2024-08-02T06:55:03.481Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of kernel raw address leakage in the hang detector module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39408|2024-08-02T18:10:20.329Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: DoS vulnerability in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-41309|2024-08-02T18:54:05.174Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the MediaPlaybackController module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-37239|2024-08-02T17:09:34.187Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Format string vulnerability in the distributed file system. Attackers who bypass the selinux permission can exploit this vulnerability to crash the program.

item.title: CVE-2023-39395|2024-08-02T18:10:20.336Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Mismatch vulnerability in the serialization process in the communication system. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41293|2024-08-02T18:54:05.024Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Data security classification vulnerability in the DDMP module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-41312|2024-08-02T18:54:04.968Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the audio module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause several apps to be activated automatically.

item.title: CVE-2023-39385|2024-08-02T18:10:20.279Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of configuration defects in the media module of certain products.. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2023-41294|2024-08-02T18:54:05.191Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The DP module has a service hijacking vulnerability.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect some Super Device services.

item.title: CVE-2023-39398|2024-08-02T18:10:20.329Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the installd module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause sandbox files to be read and written without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-37238|2024-08-02T17:09:33.589Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of apps' permission to access a certain API being incompletely verified in the wireless projection module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect some wireless projection features.

item.title: CVE-2023-34160|2024-08-02T16:01:54.353Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of spoofing trustlists of Huawei desktop.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause third-party apps to hide app icons on the desktop to prevent them from being uninstalled.

item.title: CVE-2023-1694|2024-08-02T05:57:25.026Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The Settings module has the file privilege escalation vulnerability.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-4565|2024-08-02T07:31:06.320Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Broadcast permission control vulnerability in the framework module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the hotspot feature to be unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2023-1695|2024-08-02T05:57:25.012Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of failures to capture exceptions in the communication framework. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39388|2024-08-02T18:10:20.235Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause home screen unavailability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39386|2024-08-02T18:10:20.307Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause newly installed apps to fail to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39387|2024-08-02T18:10:20.428Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of permission control in the window management module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause malicious pop-up windows.

item.title: CVE-2023-39405|2024-08-02T18:10:20.700Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of out-of-bounds parameter read/write in the Wi-Fi module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause other apps to be executed with escalated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-39404|2024-08-02T18:10:20.432Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameter verification in certain APIs in the window management module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-41311|2024-08-02T18:54:05.178Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the audio module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause an app to be activated automatically.

item.title: CVE-2023-34157|2024-08-02T16:01:54.226Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of HwWatchHealth being hijacked.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause repeated pop-up windows of the app.

item.title: CVE-2023-34167|2024-08-02T16:01:54.204Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of spoofing trustlists of Huawei desktop.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause third-party apps to hide app icons on the desktop to prevent them from being uninstalled.

item.title: CVE-2023-1691|2024-08-02T05:57:24.483Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of failures to capture exceptions in the communication framework. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39406|2024-08-02T18:10:20.701Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the XLayout component. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause apps to forcibly restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39409|2024-08-02T18:10:20.683Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: DoS vulnerability in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the system to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-4566|2024-08-02T07:31:06.623Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of trust relationships being inaccurate in distributed scenarios. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-34164|2024-08-02T16:01:54.255Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of incomplete input parameter verification in the communication framework module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-1696|2024-08-02T05:57:24.816Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The multimedia video module has a vulnerability in data processing.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-37245|2024-08-02T17:09:32.927Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in the modem pinctrl module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect the integrity and availability of the modem.

item.title: CVE-2023-41306|2024-08-02T18:54:05.042Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of mutex management in the bone voice ID trusted application (TA) module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the bone voice ID feature to be unavailable.

item.title: CVE-2023-37242|2024-08-02T17:09:33.371Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of commands from the modem being intercepted in the atcmdserver module. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to rewrite the non-volatile random-access memory (NVRAM), or facilitate the exploitation of other vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2023-34159|2024-08-02T16:01:54.212Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Improper permission control vulnerability in the Notepad app.Successful exploitation of the vulnerability may lead to privilege escalation, which affects availability and confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39401|2024-08-02T18:10:20.421Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the installd module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause sandbox files to be read and written without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-26549|2024-08-02T11:53:53.793Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The SystemUI module has a vulnerability of repeated app restart due to improper parameters. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-31225|2024-08-02T14:53:31.085Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The Gallery app has the risk of hijacking attacks. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause download failures and affect product availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-26548|2024-08-02T11:53:53.784Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The pgmng module has a vulnerability in serialization/deserialization. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41308|2024-08-02T18:54:05.108Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Screenshot vulnerability in the input module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39399|2024-08-02T18:10:20.362Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Parameter verification vulnerability in the installd module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause sandbox files to be read and written without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-41307|2024-08-02T18:54:04.951Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Memory overwriting vulnerability in the security module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41297|2024-08-02T18:54:05.168Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of defects introduced in the design process in the HiviewTunner module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause service hijacking.

item.title: CVE-2023-41302|2024-08-02T18:54:04.973Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Redirection permission verification vulnerability in the home screen module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39397|2024-08-02T18:10:20.432Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Input parameter verification vulnerability in the communication system. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.description: Vulnerability of identity verification being bypassed in the face unlock module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will affect integrity and confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-31226|2024-08-02T14:53:30.873Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: The SDK for the MediaPlaybackController module has improper permission verification. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.description: Vulnerability of improper permission management in the displayengine module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the screen to turn dim.

item.description: The InputMethod module has a vulnerability of serialization/deserialization mismatch. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause privilege escalation.

item.description: The hwPartsDFR module has a vulnerability in API calling verification. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect device confidentiality.

item.description: The Settings module has the file privilege escalation vulnerability.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.description: Vulnerability of spoofing trustlists of Huawei desktop.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability can cause third-party apps to hide app icons on the desktop to prevent them from being uninstalled.

item.description: The reminder module lacks an authentication mechanism for broadcasts received. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the window management module.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.
